text: Karanvir Sharma is a Hindi film and television actor. Karanvir is a model- turned-actor. He debuted with the film Sadda Adda. He has acted in 24: India (2013), the hindi film Zid (2014), Azhar (2016) Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana (2017) and in several TV series such as Siyaasat (Epic TV) (2015) Girl in the City Chapter 2 (2017) and Haq Se (2018).
